overview:
Jon is a serial entrepreneur with a focus on developing compelling mobile and web experiences for consumers. Jon is currently the CTO/Co-Founder of InfoScout, which provides brands with crowdsourced market intelligence by turning shoppers with smartphones into a comprehensive consumer panel.

Jon was the founder and CEO of both SkiReport.com and FantasyBook which were both successful acquisitions. SkiReport.com, acquired by Vail Resorts, was the largest mobile ski destination eclipsing 1m installs on iPhone/Android and the 2nd largest snow sports website. FantasyBook was acquired by CitizenSports, where he led their online games & fantasy leagues which became the basis of Yahoo! Sports’ games and leagues after their recent acquisition of CitizenSports.
